record.field: ALL permissions given for all the objects

All permissions (excluding delete) given for Almost all the objects.... Also given only READ permission for those object which are exclusively created by separate groups(namely, Access Product, Access Sale)]
The Admin would be provided access to all features of the system including all the configurations.
The BO user would be provided access to all features of the system except the configuration and the administration aspects. which include adding/deleting users, granting/revoking access etc.
Tour Operator, Trade or Corporate Entities.. The Client user would be provided limited access to raise enquiries and track the bookings and would also be able to edit his contact information..
Restaurants / Suppliers The Venues would also be provided limited access to the system. They would be able to add/edit their venue details and make changes/addition to the menu.
